field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist but you want to overwrite them. You can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist but you want to overwrite them. You can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.
